title: Advanced Language Education Design Utilizing AI-Based Multimedia Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of AI Systems and Intermediate-Level Language Instruction Experience
context.additional_context: A customized language education program for in-service professionals, emphasizing the ability to create and utilize multimedia content using AI technology.

learning_goals: Learners can design language education materials integrating voice, video, and text with 80% accuracy using the AI-MCP platform.
Learners apply multimedia data optimization techniques incorporating the AMSA algorithm to practical projects.
Learners develop instructional strategies that improve learner engagement by over 30% through an AI-based formative assessment system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
